title: Student Health Clinics
author: Florida International University
cleaned_text: Student Health Clinics The Student Health Clinics provide affordable and accessible student-focused medical care and promote healthy lifestyles through education, mentorship, and research activities thus facilitating the academic success of our students. We proactively assess our diverse population and work with university and community partners to address the changing needs of our students, in a holistic, innovative, and supportive environment where optimal health can be realized. Visit us on the Modesto A. Maidique Campus (MMC) or the Biscayne Bay Campus (BBC).
